column2: "Na wɔmaa me ndzɛmbir a ɔtse dɛ abaa: na wɔsee me dɛ
column5: nye afɔrmbukyia nye hɔn a wɔsɔr wɔ mu no."

column2: "Na paado a ɔwɔ asɔrdan no ho no dze
column4: na mma nnsusu; na wɔdze ama amanaman; na wobetsiatsia kurow krɔnkrɔn no do abosoom eduanan ebien."

column2: "Na mebɛma m’adasefo beenu efurafura eyitam abɛhyɛ nkɔm nda apem ahaebien eduosia."
"Iyinom nye ngodua ebien nye nkandzeadua ebien a wosisi asaase Wura enyim no."
"Na sɛ obi pɛ dɛ ɔhaw hɔn a
column3: ogya fi hɔn anomu bɛmen hɔn atamfo: obiara a ɔbɛpɛ dɛ ɔhaw hɔn no

column2: "Iyinom wɔ tum dɛ wɔtow ɔsor mu ma nsu nntɔ wɔ hɔn nkɔnhyɛ nda no mu: na wɔwɔ esu no do tum dɛ wɔdan hɔn bɔgya
column3: na wɔdze ɔyardɔm biara bɔ asaase da biara a wɔpɛ."
abowa no a ofi mona a wonnhu no mu dɔ mbrɛ ɔpem no nye hɔn bedzi ako

column2: "Na hɔn efun bɛdeda kurow kɛse no n’abrɔn mu
column3: ɔno na sunsum mu wɔfrɛ no Sodom nye Egypt
column4: mbrɛ wɔbɔɔ hɔn Ewuradze so mbeamudua mu no."

column2: "Na binom fi nkorɔfo nye mbusuakuw nye kasa nye aman mu bɔhwɛ hɔn efun ndaansa na fa
column3: na wɔnnkɛma kwan ma wɔdze hɔn efun atoto nda mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtse asaase do hɔn enyiwa bɛgye wɔ hɔn ho
column3: na hɔn ahom aka hɔnho; na wɔbɛkyekyɛ hɔnho adze; osiandɛ nkɔnhyɛfo beenu yi atseetsee hɔn a wɔtse asaase do no."

column2: "Naaso ndaansa na fa ekyir no nkwahom fi Nyankopɔn mu kɛhɛɛn hɔn mu
column3: na wogyinagyinaa hɔn anan do; na hu kɛse kaa hɔn a wohun hɔn no."

column2: "Na wɔtsee ndze kɛse bi fi sor see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom mbra ɔsor ha. Na wɔkɔr sor wɔ nsuwusiw no mu; na hɔn atamfo hun hɔn."

column2: "Na dɔn no mu asaasewosow kɛse bae
column3: na kurow ne nkyekyɛmu du mu kor hwee ase; na asaasewosow no kum nyimpa mpemesuon: na ihu kaa hɔn a wɔkaa no
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no enyimnyam."

column2: "Mbusu a otsia ebien no ebotwa mu: hwɛ
column3: mbusu a otsia ebiasa no reba ntsɛmara."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo a otsia esuon no hɛnee
column3: na ndze akɛse gyegyegyegyee wɔ sor
column5: Wiadze ahendzi abɛyɛ hɛn Ewuradze nye ne Kraest dze: na obedzi hen mbersantsen mfesantsen."

column2: "Na mpanyimfo eduonu anan no a wɔtsetse hɔn ahengua do wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim no dze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu
column9: na ewɔ hɔ daa; osiandɛ afa wo tum kɛse no

column4: nye ber a ibobu ewufo atsɛn
column5: na edze w’akatua ama wo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no
column7: nye hɔn a wosuro wo dzin nyina
column8: akɛse nye nkakramba; na asɛɛ hɔn a wɔsɛɛ asaase no."

column2: "Na wobuee Nyankopɔn asɔrdan a ɔwɔ sor no; na wohun ahyɛmu adaka no wɔ asɔrdan no mu; na enyinam nye ndze
